line_1: O Father! My Sorrow will scarce save my Bacon:
line_2: For 'twas not that I Murther'd, but that I was Taken.

line_1: 'Yet hoped that he might save his bacon:
line_2: 'He ne'er was for a conjurer taken. '

line_1: From an Ortolan down to a Rusher of Bacon.
line_2: Both Men of such Taste, their Opinions are taken

line_1: They undermin'd whole sides of bacon,
line_2: Her cheese was sapp'd, her tarts were taken,
